title: Duties of the Levite Clans
summary: Numbers 4 details the specific tasks of the Kohathites, Gershonites, and Merarites in transporting the tabernacle. Only males aged 30 to 50 were eligible for this sacred work.

faq.question: What were the Kohathites responsible for?
faq.answer: Carrying the most sacred objects, like the Ark and the altar.
